entry.title: New advertisement of Oracle and Sun and message to IBM
entry.content: Recently I was viewing Tech crunch site at techcrunch.com .Â  There was a post claiming about the new advertisement made by Oracle in the European edition of the Wall Street Journal . You may love to see the advertisement . We can call this as a comedy or something serious or like a warning in lighter words . Its such a beautiful quotes . I hope you may have enjoyed this . If you are interested to know more do visit the oracle site http://www.oracle.com/features/suncustomers.html . Don't know how long will it be there .
